content.text: Hey, I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach. What about you?
I'm a girl who loves sports cars and video games. What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and piano. I also sing.
Cool! Do you have any videos of your music up online?
No, I haven't really recorded much. I'm still learning.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like a lot of different kinds of games, but I'm really into racing games right now.
Cool! I love racing games too. I love the feeling of speed.
Me too! I also like the challenge of trying to beat my own time.
That's fun! I like that too.
Do you have a favorite racing game?
I like Forza Horizon 5. It's so much fun.
I've heard good things about that game. I've been meaning to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
